name: TIME IS A CONSTRUCTion site
description:
You're a clock face trying to climb to the top of Big Ben. Avoid builders and climb as high as you can.

W/↑/SPACE - JUMP

W/A or ←/→ - MOVE SIDEWAYS

The themes of this game jam were:

  • Time is a Construct
  • Death Means Nothing
  • That was Unexpected..

This is the first project I've ever finished, pls go easy on me xx
